name: 余琬琴
objective: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子結構、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息等。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 1)
3.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 2)
4.　　The Three-Dimensional Structure of Proteins (part 1)
5.　　The Three-Dimensional Structure of Proteins (part 2)
6.     Protein Function (part 1)
7.　　Protein Function (part 2)
8.     Exam 1
9.　　Enzymes (part 1)
10.　　Enzymes (part 2)
11.　　Carbohydrates
12.　　Nucleotides and Nucleic Acids
13.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 1)
14.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 2)
15.　　Exam 2
16.   Oral presentation
scorePolicy:
考試: 2 x 30%
Oral presentation: 30%
平時: 10%
materials: Lehninger Principles of Biochemistry by Nelson and Cox, 5th Ed, W. H. Freeman and Company (歐亞書局)
